title: County Fire Service Retirement Law: benefits.
subject: CountyFireServiceRetirementLaw
benefits

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law, the County Fire Service Retirement Law, administered by the County Foresters, Firewardens, and County Fire Protection District Firemen's Retirement Board, prescribes additional retirement benefits to county foresters, firewardens, and firefighters who are members of the system when specified conditions are met. Existing law provides that a person retiring for service, as specified, shall receive a pension payable in equal monthly installments during their lifetime, equal to one-half of the person's terminal salary, not to exceed $250 a month.

This bill would make nonsubstantive changes to that provision.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 32351 of the Government Code, relating to retirement.
